title: Power and Powerlessness
lnkText: BM.I Austria. (scroll down for the content)
intro_text: For the Kimoto exhibition at Mauthausen Memorial a small catalog was published in 2006 by the Federal Ministry of the Interior, Austria, with texts by Dr. Friedrich Fuchs, Dr. Anton Mark Miller and Ursula Kimoto. The foreword was written by Interior Minister Liese Prokop.
